thread.title: Vin Diesel and Ciara Attend 'Last Witch Hunter' Premiere in New York
thread.title_full: Vin Diesel and Ciara Attend 'Last Witch Hunter' Premiere in New York

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Vin Diesel and Ciara Attend 'Last Witch Hunter' Premiere in New York
text:
Comments The male lead is joined by his fellow cast members like Elijah Wood and director Breck Eisner at the special screening. 
" The Last Witch Hunter " cast members celebrated the movie's premiere in New York City. Vin Diesel suited up for the special screening at the AMC Lincoln Square. He was joined by one of the celebrity guests, Ciara , on the red carpet. The singer, who recorded a song called "Paint It Black" for the soundtrack, looked stunning in a black cut-out dress. Other attendees are cast members like Elijah Wood , Rose Leslie , and Lotte Verbeek. Director Breck Eisner was spotted at the October 13 event as well. The movie is scheduled to make its way out in the United States on October 23. It revolves around Kaulder, a valiant warrior who slays the all-powerful Queen Witch and gets cursed with her own immortality in the process.
